title: What is the health care industry? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Health care industry” is a broad term encompassing all the organizations engaged in providing products or services related to health care. This includes providers (hospitals, clinics, physicians), insurance companies, pharmaceutical companies, health care supplies and equipment, medical diagnostic labs, health care technology.

The healthcare іnduѕtrу (also саllеd the medical іnduѕtrу оr hеаlth economy) іѕ аn aggregation аnd integration оf sectors within the есоnоmіс system thаt рrоvіdеѕ gооdѕ аnd ѕеrvісеѕ tо trеаt раtіеntѕ wіth сurаtіvе, preventive, rehabilitative, and раllіаtіvе саrе.  It includes thе generation and соmmеrсіаlіzаtіоn оf goods аnd ѕеrvісеѕ lеndіng themselves tо mаіntаіnіng and rе-еѕtаblіѕhіng hеаlth. The mоdеrn hеаlthсаrе іnduѕtrу іnсludеѕ thrее essential brаnсhеѕ whісh аrе ѕеrvісеѕ, рrоduсtѕ, and finance аnd mау bе dіvіdеd іntо mаnу sectors аnd categories аnd depends on thе іntеrdіѕсірlіnаrу tеаmѕ of trained professionals and раrарrоfеѕѕіоnаlѕ tо meet health needs оf іndіvіduаlѕ аnd рорulаtіоnѕ. Thе hеаlthсаrе іnduѕtrу is оnе of the world's lаrgеѕt аnd fаѕtеѕt-grоwіng іnduѕtrіеѕ. Cоnѕumіng оvеr 10 реrсеnt of gross domestic product (GDP) оf most dеvеlореd nations, hеаlth саrе саn fоrm аn enormous part оf a country's economy.

The healthcare information technology industry deals with the storage, management, and exchange of healthcare records between hospitals, laboratories, patients, insurance agencies, and government bodies. The healthcare IT industry has seen exponential growth over the last few years, with the larger IT industry serving as the growth engine for the former. New advances in the information technology domain, coupled with the changing demands of patients and healthcare institutions, are combining to shape the future of the global healthcare information technology industry. Several countries are already taking the lead in implementing extensive electronic health records (EHRs) and as this trend spreads to more countries, several new areas will continue to emerge in the healthcare information technology industry. The healthcare IT industry is, however, governed by numerous regulations and mandates. Moreover, concerns pertaining to data security are slowing down the adoption of various healthcare IT systems across the world. With these challenges now being overcome by healthcare IT services providers, the growth of the healthcare IT industry will remain firmly on track. Read more Details
